message:
Semaphore is a wait handle (OS kernel object) that supports cross-thread and cross-process coordination.

SemaphoreSlim is a faster implementation that will fall back on a lazily-constructed wait handle (OS kernel object) if necessary. It is only for cross-thread use and does not support cross-process coordination. SemaphoreSlim also has been enhanced to allow asynchronous coordination (WaitAsync).

More here: [https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/z6zx288a(v=vs.110).aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/z6zx288a(v=vs.110).aspx)
